Hanson Smith

  1. Foster Name: Hanson
  2. Alternate Foster Name: "Dutch", Moodey
  3. Foster Family: Guy and Thetis Moody
  4. Foster Family Alt: Moodey
  5. Location of Family: Stella, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  7. Arrival Place: Auburn, NE
  8. Age on Arrival: 6
  9. Date of Birth: 1908-02-22, New York City, NY
  10. Date of Death: 1993-11-21, Lincoln, NE
  11. Gender: male
  12. Spouse Name: Vionetta B. Hill
  13. Source: Nemaha County Herald (Auburn, NE), 15 February 1915; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; Falls City Journal (Falls City, NE), 22 November 1993.
